title: Giellatekno ja Apertium | Friddja ja rabasgáldokodavuđot dihtorjorgalanvuogádat
description: %%UNAVAILABLE%% Giellatekno provides free translation systems for Saami (and other) languages, using the Apertium rule-based machine translation platform. The code and data is free software and released under the terms of the GNU General Public License.
Translation_Help: %%UNAVAILABLE%% Choose two languages and translate your text using Giellatekno's translators!
All_Translation_Help: %%UNAVAILABLE%% Choose two languages and translate your text, documents and webpages using Giellatekno's translators!
Contact_Us: Váldde áinnas oktavuođa minguin jus gávnnat meattáhusa, jus dus lea miella bargat prošeavttain dahje don eará ládje háliidat min veahkehit.
Enable_JS_Warning: %%UNAVAILABLE%% This site only works with JavaScript enabled, if you cannot enable Javascript, then try the plain HTML translators.
Not_Found_Error: %%UNAVAILABLE%% 404 Error: Sorry, that page doesn't exist anymore!
What_Is_Apertium: %%UNAVAILABLE%% The translators on this page are developed by Giellatekno UiT <!-- TODO -->
Documentation_Para: %%UNAVAILABLE%% Documentation for Giellatekno can be found on Giellatekno's home page. Documentation for Apertium can be found on their Wiki under the Documentation and Publications pages. Installation instructions for Giellatekno and Apertium on all major platforms are provided on the Wiki's Installation page.
